text: The 2019–20 Hazfi Cup was the 33rd season of the Iranian football knockout competition. ==Participating teams== A total of 96 teams are eligible participate in the 2019–20 Hazfi Cup. The teams were divided into four main groups. 16 teams of the Persian Gulf Pro League: (entering from Round of 32) {| |- style="vertical-align: top;" | * Esteghlal * Foolad * Gol Gohar * Mashin Sazi * Naft Masjed Soleyman * Nassaji * Pars Jonoubi Jam * Persepolis | * Peykan * Saipa * Sanat Naft * Sepahan * Shahin * Shahr Khodro * Tractor * Zob Ahan |} 18 teams of Azadegan League: (entering from Third Round) {| |- style="vertical-align: top;" | * Aluminium Arak * Arman Gohar Sirjan * Baadraan Tehran * Damash Gilan * Elmoadab Tabriz * Esteghlal Khuzestan * Fajr Sepasi * Gol Reyhan * Khooshe Talaei Saveh | * Malavan * Mes Kerman * Mes Rafsanjan * Navad Urmia * Nirooye Zamini * Qashqai Shiraz * Rayka Babol * Sorkhpooshan Pakdasht * Sepidrood |} 28 teams of 2nd Division: (entering from Second Round) {| |- style="vertical-align: top;" | *Besat Kermanshah *Caspian Qazvin *Chooka Talesh *Darayi Gaz *Esteghlal Ahvaz *Esteghlal Molasani *Ettehad Kamyaran *Foolad Novin Ahvaz *Karoon Arvand Khorramshahr *Kheybar Khorramabad *Melli Hafari Ahvaz *Mes Novin Kerman *Milad Mehr Iranian *Moghavemat Tehran | *Naft va Gaz Gachsaran *Naft Omidieh *PAS Hamedan *Perspolis Ganaveh *Sardar Bookan *Shahid Ghandi Yazd *Shahrdari Astara *Shahrdari Bam *Shahrdari Bandar Abbas *Shahrdari Fooman *Shahrdari Hamedan *Shahrdari Mahshahr *Shohadaye Babolsar *Shohadaye Razakan Karaj |} 34 teams of Provincial Leagues: (Kish and Khoramshahr can have extra Representatives.) (entering from First Round) {| |- style="vertical-align: top;" | *Alborz *Ardebil (Shahrdari Bilehsavar) *Azarbayejan Gharbi *Azarbayejan Sharghi *Boushehr (Siraf Kangan) *Chaharmahal & Bakhtiyari (Payam Dezpat Ardal) *Fars (Oghab Shiraz) *Gilan (Sardar Jangal Gourab) *Golestan *Hamedan (Zob Felezat Hamedan) *Hormozgan *Ilam (Mehrgan Dare Shahr) *Isfahan (Rezvani Isfahan) *Kerman (Shahrdari Rigan) *Kermanshah *Khoramshahr *Khorasan Jonoubi (Talaye Sorkh Qaenat) | *Khorasan Razavi (Shahrdari Bardeskan) *Khorasan Shomali *Khouzestan (Esteghlal Novin Mahshahr) *Kish (Malavan Kish) Semnan) *Sistan & Balouchestan (Heyat Football Iranshahr) *Tehran (Parag Tehran) *Tehran Suburbs (Shahid Oraki Eslamshahr) *Yazd *Zanjan (Shahrdari Khodabande) |} ==Schedule== The schedule of the Provincial Leagues (4) ! style="width:20%;"| Total |- | | | | | |} == Bracket == ==Statistics== === Top Scorers === Goalscorers count only from the second stage. Players in bold are still in the competition. {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ !Rank !Player !Club !Goals |- |rowspan=1 align="center"|1 | Bahman Salari |Shahin Bushehr |rowspan=1 align="center"|4 |- |rowspan=3 align="center"|2 | Ahmad Aljabouri |Naft Masjed Soleyman |rowspan=3 align="center"|3 |- | Ali Alipour |Persepolis |- | Ashkan Dejagah |Tractor |- | rowspan="9" align="center" |3 | Ali Cheraghi |Shahrdari Mahshahr | rowspan="9" align="center" |2 |- | Danyal Momeni |Shahin Bushehr |- | Easa Mousavi |Esteghlal Novin Mahshahr |- | Hossein Shanani |Mes Kerman |- | Mohammad Ahle Shakhe |Sanat Naft |- | Sajjad Aghayi |Esteghlal |- | Shervin Bozorg |Mes Kerman |- | Voria Ghafouri |Esteghlal |} ===Discipline=== A player is automatically suspended for the next match for the following offences: * Receiving a red card (red card suspensions may be extended for serious offences) * Receiving two yellow cards in two different matches (yellow card suspensions are not carried forward to any other leagues) The following suspensions were served during the tournament: {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
